entry.title: Monday night: Chance of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow early this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
